name: The Trials of Khione
description:
In this game you play as the Greek Goddess of Snow, Khione. Stripped of her immortality by her father Boreas and sent to the mortal world, the game opens in a small village suspicious of outsiders. The Elder of this village does not believe your claim that you are a goddess, and he sets you a series of three trials, during which you will gather followers and become stronger. With each follower gathered and each trial passed, more villagers believe you to be a goddess. Eventually, the Elder will finally believe you and the whole town will adopt you as their patron goddess. Will this be enough to reclaim your immortality? Or will you falter along the way?

Controls

Arrow Keys - Move/Navigate Menus

Escape Key - Pause Menu

Shift - Movement Speed

Partial gamepad integration

Game Jam

This game was created over a 48 hour period for the Moray Game Jam 2019. The theme for the Moray Game Jam was 'seeing is believing'. The result is a small, linear RPG, with a run time of roughly 45 minutes.
